1.name: CB GroupJive
1.description: Take your Community to the next social level by empowering your users to organize themselves into common interest groups. Sit back and watch your community interact, socialize and expand your community by inviting their friends to their groups and your website.

3.name: CB Paid Subscriptions
3.description: Start charging paid subscriptions for users to access your website content. Supports duration based subscriptions, merchandise sales and user donations. Very powerful and flexible solution that supports VAT sales tax, powerful coupon discounting, automated reminder emailing and many more built-in integrations. All inclusive package installs everything for you.

4.name: CB Activity
4.description: Adds interactive walls where users can share their thoughts and happenings and engage in online discussions through comments. There is also a CB Activity module to display activity stream in a Joomla module. Combined with CB Auto Actions (separate CB plugin) to automatically push profile updates and forum posts to wall. This package includes the CB plugin, Joomla module, and Joomla bot.

5.name: CB ProfileBook
5.description: Guestbook, blog and/or wall tabs can be added to profiles. Let your members communicate with this powerful 3-in-1 add-on. Package includes Latest Entries module.

6.name: CB Package Builder
6.description: Most powerful and flexible file download solution for Joomla. This CB plugin lets you transform your digital files into packages that can only be downloaded by authorized users. Joomla ACL is supported along with built in conditions (based on user CB field values) can be used for download authorization. CB Packager Bot, CBSubs Packager Bot and CB Packager module also available in this all inclusive package.

7.name: CB Gallery
7.description: Image, video, music and file galleries can be added by members in their profiles. Easy and simple with powerful quota system. Media can also be moderated before final publication. CB Gallery Bot and CB Gallery Module also available in this all inclusive package.

8.name: CB Auto Actions
8.description: Configure workflow related tasks around your community without coding. Send emails, private messages, update field values, change Joomla ACL group, execute database queries and even more actions when a specific event happens. Powerful tool to make awesome things happen in your community. This package installs both the CB plugin and the Joomla bot.

9.name: CB AntiSpam
9.description: Human challenge your CB forms (registration, login, forgotten password, email messaging) with Captcha image with audio playback and refresh button (also supports recaptcha and question mode). Automated blocking of offenders, limit account sharing and more features. This package includes the CB plugin and Joomla bot.

1.name: Community Builder
1.description: Social websites go far beyond Facebook look-a-likes and CB has literally hundreds of built-in features and can be extended with extra (free or commercial) add-ons from the CB Team and other parties that will help you realize your very own - tailored to your specific needs - social networking website.

128.name: CB Package Builder Bot
128.description: Works with the CB Package Builder plugin and lets you embed package and preset information in Joomla content. General substitution format is [cbpkb:packages package="#" /] and [cbpkb:presets preset="#" /] and there are many extra options to display only specific content.

142.name: CB Package Builder Search Bot
142.description: This Joomla plugin extends the Joomla search box to also search in CB Package Builder packages.

49.name: CB Author Bot
49.description: Joomla plugin that links article author name to CB user profile page. Great way for your users to learn more about specific authors and explore other author related content.

70.name: CB Search Bot
70.description: Use the Joomla search function to find CB user profiles based on CB field data of profiles. CB Privacy settings respected during searching. This is a Joomla plugin.

80.name: CB GroupJive Search Bot
80.description: This Joomla plugin extends the Joomla search box to also search in CB GroupJive groups.

117.name: CB Paid Subscriptions Bot
117.description: This Joomla Plugin integrates with your Joomla website and lets CBSubs control access to your content.

137.name: CB Gallery Bot
137.description: Joomla plugin for CB Gallery that lets you put gallery media in your Joomla content articles.

145.name: CB AntiSpam Bot
145.description: Joomla plugin for CB AntiSpam that lets you utilize its captcha throughout Joomla.

141.name: CB Activity Bot
141.description: Joomla plugin for CB Activity that lets you put activity streams in your Joomla content articles and added commenting as well as likes to your content articles.

143.name: CB Auto Actions Bot
143.description: Allows CB Auto Actions to act on Joomla events.

54.name: CB Content Bot
54.description: Show CB fields or CB Tabs in your Joomla content articles. You can even use CB substitutions to show or hide article content based on viewer CB field values.

120.name: CB Replacer Bot
120.description: Create handy substitution string and REGEX placeholders with this Joomla plugin and place them in your articles. This way you simply change placeholder mapping once and it will propagate to all content articles.

133.name: CB Redirect Bot
133.description: Extend Joomlas redirect component with handy REGEXP supported full or partial URL rewriting rules for 404 URLs. Take back control of your 404 redirects!

129.name: CB Package Builder Module
129.description: Display CB Package Builder packages or presets in a Joomla module position.

136.name: CB Gallery Module
136.description: CB Gallery module lets you display a gallery in a Joomla module position.

47.name: CB Activity Module
47.description: Show activity stream in a Joomla module.

81.name: CB GroupJive Module
81.description: This Joomla module displays CB GroupJive group related data.

118.name: CB Paid Subscriptions Module
118.description: Joomla module that quickly displays available CBSubs plan purchases or upgrades to logged in user or anonymous (not logge in) users.

55.name: CB Content Module
55.description: Push custom HTML code with CB content in a Joomla module. CB substitutions are supported and you can also push css, javascript and jquery to your page headers. Very powerful module can basically replace the Joomla custom HTML module.

66.name: CB ProfileBook Module
66.description: Joomla module that shows latest profile book posts.

121.name: Funlite
121.description: Lightweight Joomla template with a clean colorful look. Has built-in mark-uo support for all Community Builder pages (no need for extra CB template). Fully responsive bootstrap-based design.

123.name: Flexistrap
123.description: Lightweight Joomla template with a flexible look. Has built-in mark-uo support for all Community Builder pages (no need for extra CB template). Fully responsive bootstrap-based design.

124.name: Coolness
124.description: Lightweight Joomla template with a clean cool look. Has built-in mark-uo support for all Community Builder pages (no need for extra CB template). Fully responsive bootstrap-based design.

126.name: MyCommunity
126.description: Lightweight Joomla template with a clean community look. Has built-in mark-uo support for all Community Builder pages (no need for extra CB template). Fully responsive bootstrap-based design.

130.name: CB Package Builder
130.description: Most powerful and flexible file download solution for Joomla. This CB plugin lets you transform your digital files into packages that can only be downloaded by authorized users. Joomla ACL is supported along with built in conditions (based on user CB field values) can be used for download authorization. CB Packager Bot, CBSubs Packager Bot and CB Packager module also available.

85.name: CB Paid Subscriptions
85.description: This is the main CB plugin that is needed to add paid or free subscriptions to your Joomla/CB powered website. Other optional plugins can also be installed if needed for your business use case.

86.name: CBSubs Rounded Template
86.description: This is the rounded template plugin for CBSubs. It lets you change the look of your plan offerings.

87.name: CBSubs AcyMailing
87.description: This is a CBSubs integration plugin for the AcyMailing newsletter extension.

88.name: CBSubs CB Fields
88.description: This is the CBSubs Integration Plugin for CB Fields. It integrates with CB and lets you change the values of a CB Field based on subscription activations/deactivations.

89.name: CBSubs Content
89.description: This is the CBSubs Integration plugin for Joomla content, It lets you protect Joomla content requiring specific plan subscriptions to access. The CBSubs bot (Joomla plugin) is needed to make this protection work.

90.name: CBSubs Email
90.description: This is the CBSubs Email Integration plugin. It extends the email notification functionality of CBSubs to support more subscription related events.

91.name: CBSubs Fields Tabs Protection
91.description: This is the CBSubs Fields/Tabs Protection Integration Plugin. It integrates with CB and lets you protect CB Tabs and Fields to require specific CBSubs Plans for viewing or access.

92.name: CBSubs Folder Access
92.description: This is the CBSubs Folder Access Integration plugin. Lets CBSubs protect access to webserver folders (apache server).

93.name: CBSubs Google Analytics
93.description: CBSubs Google Analytics Integration Plugin. It integrates with Google Analytics services letting it track your business traffic.

94.name: CBSubs GroupJive
94.description: CBSubs GroupJive Integration Plugin. It integrates with CB GroupJive and lets you automatically add users to specific GroupJive groups based on a CBSubs plan subscription.

95.name: CBSubs iDevAffiliate
95.description: CBSubs idev affiliate Integration Plugin. It integrates with the Joomla idev affiliates extension.

96.name: CBSubs Mailer
96.description: CBSubs Mailer Plugin. Adds automated, programmable, personal email messaging functionality to your CBSubs Solution environment. Needs CBSubs Tax plugin to function.

97.name: CBSubs Piwiki
97.description: CBSubs piwiki Integration Plugin. Integrates with the open-source piwiki script.

98.name: CBSubs Plan Image
98.description: CBSubs Plan Image Integration Plugin. Integrates with CB and adds a new plan image field type.

105.name: CBSubs CIC Credit Mutuel
105.description: CBSubs CIC Credit Mutuel Payment Processor Plugin

108.name: CBSubs Moneris Select Plus
108.description: CBSubs Moneris Select Plus Payment Processor Plugin

109.name: CBSubs PayPal Advanced
109.description: CBSubs Paypal Advanced Payment Processor Plugin

110.name: CBSubs PayPal Pro
110.description: CBSubs Paypal Pro Payment Processor Plugin

114.name: CBSubs TeleMoney Easy Pay
114.description: CBSubs TeleMoney Easy Pay Payment Processor Plugin

116.name: CBSubs World Pay
116.description: CBSubs World Pay Payment Processor Plugin

131.name: CBSubs Package Builder
131.description: CBSubs integration plugin for the CB Package Builder. It lets you protect a package or preset an require a CBSubs subscription to download.

46.name: CB Activity
46.description: Adds interactive walls where users can share their thoughts and happenings and engage in online discussions through comments. There is also a CB Activity module available to display stream in Joomla module. Combined with CB Auto Actions (separate CB plugin) to automatically push profile updates and forum posts to wall.

48.name: CB AntiSpam
48.description: Human challenge your CB forms (registration, login, forgotten password, email messaging) with Captcha image with audio playback and refresh button (also supports recaptcha and question mode). Automated blocking of offenders, limit account sharing and more features.

50.name: CB Auto Actions
50.description: Configure workflow related tasks around your community without coding. Send emails, private messages, update field values, change Joomla ACL group, execute database queries and even more actions when a specific event happens. Powerful tool to make awesome things happen in your community.

58.name: CB Gallery
58.description: Image, video, music and file galleries can be added by members in their profiles. Easy and simple with powerful quota system. Media can also be moderated before final publication.

72.name: CB GroupJive
72.description: Take your Community to the next social level by empowering your users to organize themselves into common interest groups. Sit back and watch your community interact, socialize and expand your community by inviting their friends to their groups and your website. This is the main CB GroupJive plugin.

73.name: CB GroupJive About
73.description: This is the CB GroupJive About plugin that renders the tooltip description for each group.

74.name: CB GroupJive Events
74.description: This is the CB GroupJive Events plugin that supports the events tab functionality for groups.

75.name: CB GroupJive File
75.description: This is the CB GroupJive Files plugin that supports the group file sharing functionality.

76.name: CB GroupJive Forums
76.description: This is the CB GroupJive Forum plugin that integrates with the Kunena forum extension (installed separately) giving private forum discussions for group members.

77.name: CB GroupJive Photo
77.description: This is the CB GroupJive Photo plugin that supports photo sharing in groups.

78.name: CB GroupJive Video
78.description: This is the GroupJive Video plugin that supports video sharing in groups.

79.name: CB GroupJive Wall
79.description: This is the CB GroupJive Wall plugin that supports wall discussions in groups.

51.name: CB Auto Welcome
51.description: Send personalized email or private messages to your users when they join your website. Great way to welcome your new users and get them up to speed with your website. Also supports automated connection requests.

52.name: CB Conditional
52.description: Dynamically show or hide CB fields or entire tabs depending on other field data. Great way to personalize your CB registration form and user profiles for your community. Very powerful concept lets you fine tune data entry.

53.name: CB Connect
53.description: Let hundreds of millions of Facebook, Twitter, Google, LinkedIn, Windows Live, Instagram, Foursquare, GitHub, VKontakte, Steam, Reddit, Twitch, Stack Exchange, Pinterest, Amazon, Yahoo, PayPal, Disqus, WordPress, Meetup, Flickr, Vimeo, LINE, Spotify, and SoundCloud users to directly and comfortably sign-in to your Community Builder powered website.

56.name: CB Core Fields Ajax
56.description: Make any core CB field be Ajax powered for inline editing (no need to edit profile). Install, publish and configure the fields you want to be inline editable.

57.name: CB Footer Removal
57.description: Authorization to remove all Powered by Community Builder footer links from all your websites for CB 2.x.

59.name: CB Google Translate
59.description: This plugin will add a language drop-down selector to your CB Login module and translate your website using google service. Very useful for multi-language audiences.

60.name: CB Gravatar Field
60.description: Use your Gravatar images as a CB field based on email address of user. You can specify default image to show if user does not have Gravatar account.

61.name: CB Invites
61.description: Empower your members to invite their friends to your website. Easy to configure. Lets your members send personalized invitations to their friends with unique invitation codes.

62.name: CB Last Views Tab
62.description: Add a new tab to your profiles to let members see who has been visiting their profile! Also has administrative view with filtering.

63.name: CB Privacy
63.description: Extensive privacy controls for members and administrators. Applies to any CB field and CB Tab. Lets users remove their account by themselves and many more features.

64.name: CB Profile Update Logger
64.description: Keep track of who changed what and when in their user profile. This script will produce a FILO list of profile updates for each user profile. Email notifications are also sent to CB Moderators on each profile update action.

65.name: CB ProfileBook
65.description: Guestbook, blog and/or wall tabs can be added to profiles. Let your members communicate with this powerful 3-in-1 add-on. Package includes Latest Entries module.

67.name: CB Progress Field
67.description: This plugin allows you to create a CB progress field to show your members what their profile completeness progress is. Allows you to select fields to track and shows a nice progress bar. Create as many progress fields as you want.

68.name: CB Query Field
68.description: Lets you grab data using a database query and display results as a CB field. Check box, radio button and dropdown types are supported and you can also validate entries of existing fields against database queries.

69.name: CB Reconfirm Email
69.description: Force users to reconfirm email each time they change their CB user profile email address. Users can revert change from their old email address or finalize confirmation from new email address.

71.name: CB Template Changer
71.description: Allow users to change the profile CB template as they please. Users can select if profile setting is to apply only for them or even for all users viewing user's profile.

119.name: CB Code Field
119.description: Lets you execute your PHP code and display results as a CB field. Check box, radio button and dropdown types are supported. You can also chain fields to force re-execution or PHP code when a field value is updated.

147.name: CB Field Groups
147.description: This CB field type plugin lets you create groups of fields that can be repeated by the user such as multiple phone numbers, pets, addresses, and more.

82.name: CB Primer Book
82.description: Primer Book for Community Builder is a great way to get started and quickly leverage the basic functionality available.

83.name: CB GroupJive Primer Book
83.description: The GroupJive Primer Book is freely available to download. GroupJive itself needs a subscription to download.

84.name: CBSubs Manual
84.description: Comprehensive all inclusive guide to CBSubs includes many use case examples.

138.name: CBSubs DevKit Integrations
138.description: Guide describing CBSubs integration API usage.

139.name: CBSubs DevKit Gateways
139.description: Guide describing CBSubs gateway API usage.

141.description: Joomla plugin for CB Activity that lets you put activity streams in your Joomla content articles and added commenting as well as likes to your content articles.

143.name: CB Auto Actions Bot
143.description: Allows CB Auto Actions to act on Joomla events.

54.name: CB Content Bot
54.description: Show CB fields or CB Tabs in your Joomla content articles. You can even use CB substitutions to show or hide article content based on viewer CB field values.

120.name: CB Replacer Bot
120.description: Create handy substitution string and REGEX placeholders with this Joomla plugin and place them in your articles. This way you simply change placeholder mapping once and it will propagate to all content articles.

133.name: CB Redirect Bot
133.description: Extend Joomlas redirect component with handy REGEXP supported full or partial URL rewriting rules for 404 URLs. Take back control of your 404 redirects!

129.name: CB Package Builder Module
129.description: Display CB Package Builder packages or presets in a Joomla module position.

136.name: CB Gallery Module
136.description: CB Gallery module lets you display a gallery in a Joomla module position.

47.name: CB Activity Module
47.description: Show activity stream in a Joomla module.

81.name: CB GroupJive Module
81.description: This Joomla module displays CB GroupJive group related data.

118.name: CB Paid Subscriptions Module
118.description: Joomla module that quickly displays available CBSubs plan purchases or upgrades to logged in user or anonymous (not logge in) users.

55.name: CB Content Module
55.description: Push custom HTML code with CB content in a Joomla module. CB substitutions are supported and you can also push css, javascript and jquery to your page headers. Very powerful module can basically replace the Joomla custom HTML module.

66.name: CB ProfileBook Module
66.description: Joomla module that shows latest profile book posts.

122.name: Funlite
122.description: Lightweight Joomla template with a clean colorful look. Has built-in mark-uo support for all Community Builder pages (no need for extra CB template). Fully responsive bootstrap-based design.

123.name: Flexistrap
123.description: Lightweight Joomla template with a flexible look. Has built-in mark-uo support for all Community Builder pages (no need for extra CB template). Fully responsive bootstrap-based design.

125.name: Coolness
125.description: Lightweight Joomla template with a clean cool look. Has built-in mark-uo support for all Community Builder pages (no need for extra CB template). Fully responsive bootstrap-based design.

127.name: MyCommunity
127.description: Lightweight Joomla template with a clean community look. Has built-in mark-uo support for all Community Builder pages (no need for extra CB template). Fully responsive bootstrap-based design.

130.name: CB Package Builder
130.description: Most powerful and flexible file download solution for Joomla. This CB plugin lets you transform your digital files into packages that can only be downloaded by authorized users. Joomla ACL is supported along with built in conditions (based on user CB field values) can be used for download authorization. CB Packager Bot, CBSubs Packager Bot and CB Packager module also available.

85.name: CB Paid Subscriptions
85.description: This is the main CB plugin that is needed to add paid or free subscriptions to your Joomla/CB powered website. Other optional plugins can also be installed if needed for your business use case.

86.name: CBSubs Rounded Template
86.description: This is the rounded template plugin for CBSubs. It lets you change the look of your plan offerings.

87.name: CBSubs AcyMailing
87.description: This is a CBSubs integration plugin for the AcyMailing newsletter extension.

88.name: CBSubs CB Fields
88.description: This is the CBSubs Integration Plugin for CB Fields. It integrates with CB and lets you change the values of a CB Field based on subscription activations/deactivations.

89.name: CBSubs Content
89.description: This is the CBSubs Integration plugin for Joomla content, It lets you protect Joomla content requiring specific plan subscriptions to access. The CBSubs bot (Joomla plugin) is needed to make this protection work.

90.name: CBSubs Email
90.description: This is the CBSubs Email Integration plugin. It extends the email notification functionality of CBSubs to support more subscription related events.

91.name: CBSubs Fields Tabs Protection
91.description: This is the CBSubs Fields/Tabs Protection Integration Plugin. It integrates with CB and lets you protect CB Tabs and Fields to require specific CBSubs Plans for viewing or access.

92.name: CBSubs Folder Access
92.description: This is the CBSubs Folder Access Integration plugin. Lets CBSubs protect access to webserver folders (apache server).

93.name: CBSubs Google Analytics
93.description: CBSubs Google Analytics Integration Plugin. It integrates with Google Analytics services letting it track your business traffic.

94.name: CBSubs GroupJive
94.description: CBSubs GroupJive Integration Plugin. It integrates with CB GroupJive and lets you automatically add users to specific GroupJive groups based on a CBSubs plan subscription.

95.name: CBSubs iDevAffiliate
95.description: CBSubs idev affiliate Integration Plugin. It integrates with the Joomla idev affiliates extension.

96.name: CBSubs Mailer
96.description: CBSubs Mailer Plugin. Adds automated, programmable, personal email messaging functionality to your CBSubs Solution environment. Needs CBSubs Tax plugin to function.

97.name: CBSubs Piwiki
97.description: CBSubs piwiki Integration Plugin. Integrates with the open-source piwiki script.

98.name: CBSubs Plan Image
98.description: CBSubs Plan Image Integration Plugin. Integrates with CB and adds a new plan image field type.

105.name: CBSubs CIC Credit Mutuel
105.description: CBSubs CIC Credit Mutuel Payment Processor Plugin

108.name: CBSubs Moneris Select Plus
108.description: CBSubs Moneris Select Plus Payment Processor Plugin

109.name: CBSubs PayPal Advanced
109.description: CBSubs Paypal Advanced Payment Processor Plugin

110.name: CBSubs PayPal Pro
110.description: CBSubs Paypal Pro Payment Processor Plugin

114.name: CBSubs TeleMoney Easy Pay
114.description: CBSubs TeleMoney Easy Pay Payment Processor Plugin

116.name: CBSubs World Pay
116.description: CBSubs World Pay Payment Processor Plugin

131.name: CBSubs Package Builder
131.description: CBSubs integration plugin for the CB Package Builder. It lets you protect a package or preset an require a CBSubs subscription to download.

46.name: CB Activity
46.description: Adds interactive walls where users can share their thoughts and happenings and engage in online discussions through comments. There is also a CB Activity module available to display stream in Joomla module. Combined with CB Auto Actions (separate CB plugin) to automatically push profile updates and forum posts to wall.

48.name: CB AntiSpam
48.description: Human challenge your CB forms (registration, login, forgotten password, email messaging) with Captcha image with audio playback and refresh button (also supports recaptcha and question mode). Automated blocking of offenders, limit account sharing and more features.

50.name: CB Auto Actions
50.description: Configure workflow related tasks around your community without coding. Send emails, private messages, update field values, change Joomla ACL group, execute database queries and even more actions when a specific event happens. Powerful tool to make awesome things happen in your community.

58.name: CB Gallery
58.description: Image, video, music and file galleries can be added by members in their profiles. Easy and simple with powerful quota system. Media can also be moderated before final publication.

72.name: CB GroupJive
72.description: Take your Community to the next social level by empowering your users to organize themselves into common interest groups. Sit back and watch your community interact, socialize and expand your community by inviting their friends to their groups and your website. This is the main CB GroupJive plugin.

73.name: CB GroupJive About
73.description: This is the CB GroupJive About plugin that renders the tooltip description for each group.

74.name: CB GroupJive Events
74.description: This is the CB GroupJive Events plugin that supports the events tab functionality for groups.

75.name: CB GroupJive File
75.description: This is the CB GroupJive Files plugin that supports the group file sharing functionality.

76.name: CB GroupJive Forums
76.description: This is the CB GroupJive Forum plugin that integrates with the Kunena forum extension (installed separately) giving private forum discussions for group members.

77.name: CB GroupJive Photo
77.description: This is the CB GroupJive Photo plugin that supports photo sharing in groups.

78.name: CB GroupJive Video
78.description: This is the GroupJive Video plugin that supports video sharing in groups.

79.name: CB GroupJive Wall
79.description: This is the CB GroupJive Wall plugin that supports wall discussions in groups.

51.name: CB Auto Welcome
51.description: Send personalized email or private messages to your users when they join your website. Great way to welcome your new users and get them up to speed with your website. Also supports automated connection requests.

52.name: CB Conditional
52.description: Dynamically show or hide CB fields or entire tabs depending on other field data. Great way to personalize your CB registration form and user profiles for your community. Very powerful concept lets you fine tune data entry.

53.name: CB Connect
53.description: Let hundreds of millions of Facebook, Twitter, Google, LinkedIn, Windows Live, Instagram, Foursquare, GitHub, VKontakte, Steam, Reddit, Twitch, Stack Exchange, Pinterest, Amazon, Yahoo, PayPal, Disqus, WordPress, Meetup, Flickr, Vimeo, LINE, Spotify, and SoundCloud users to directly and comfortably sign-in to your Community Builder powered website.

56.name: CB Core Fields Ajax
56.description: Make any core CB field be Ajax powered for inline editing (no need to edit profile). Install, publish and configure the fields you want to be inline editable.

57.name: CB Footer Removal
57.description: Authorization to remove all Powered by Community Builder footer links from all your websites for CB 2.x.

59.name: CB Google Translate
59.description: This plugin will add a language drop-down selector to your CB Login module and translate your website using google service. Very useful for multi-language audiences.

60.name: CB Gravatar Field
60.description: Use your Gravatar images as a CB field based on email address of user. You can specify default image to show if user does not have Gravatar account.

61.name: CB Invites
61.description: Empower your members to invite their friends to your website. Easy to configure. Lets your members send personalized invitations to their friends with unique invitation codes.

62.name: CB Last Views Tab
62.description: Add a new tab to your profiles to let members see who has been visiting their profile! Also has administrative view with filtering.

63.name: CB Privacy
63.description: Extensive privacy controls for members and administrators. Applies to any CB field and CB Tab. Lets users remove their account by themselves and many more features.

64.name: CB Profile Update Logger
64.description: Keep track of who changed what and when in their user profile. This script will produce a FILO list of profile updates for each user profile. Email notifications are also sent to CB Moderators on each profile update action.

65.name: CB ProfileBook
65.description: Guestbook, blog and/or wall tabs can be added to profiles. Let your members communicate with this powerful 3-in-1 add-on. Package includes Latest Entries module.

67.name: CB Progress Field
67.description: This plugin allows you to create a CB progress field to show your members what their profile completeness progress is. Allows you to select fields to track and shows a nice progress bar. Create as many progress fields as you want.

68.name: CB Query Field
68.description: Lets you grab data using a database query and display results as a CB field. Check box, radio button and dropdown types are supported and you can also validate entries of existing fields against database queries.

69.name: CB Reconfirm Email
69.description: Force users to reconfirm email each time they change their CB user profile email address. Users can revert change from their old email address or finalize confirmation from new email address.

71.name: CB Template Changer
71.description: Allow users to change the profile CB template as they please. Users can select if profile setting is to apply only for them or even for all users viewing user's profile.

119.name: CB Code Field
119.description: Lets you execute your PHP code and display results as a CB field. Check box, radio button and dropdown types are supported. You can also chain fields to force re-execution or PHP code when a field value is updated.

147.name: CB Field Groups
147.description: This CB field type plugin lets you create groups of fields that can be repeated by the user such as multiple phone numbers, pets, addresses, and more.

82.name: CB Primer Book
82.description: Primer Book for Community Builder is a great way to get started and quickly leverage the basic functionality available.

83.name: CB GroupJive Primer Book
83.description: The GroupJive Primer Book is freely available to download. GroupJive itself needs a subscription to download.

84.name: CBSubs Manual
84.description: Comprehensive all inclusive guide to CBSubs includes many use case examples.

138.name: CBSubs DevKit Integrations
138.description: Guide describing CBSubs integration API usage.

139.name: CBSubs DevKit Gateways
139.description: Guide describing CBSubs gateway API usage.
